info.title: Swagger Petstore
info.description: This is a sample server Petstore server.

post.description: Add a new pet to the store

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Pet object that needs to be added to the store

definitions.Category:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
    <xs:element name="country">
        <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
                <xs:element name="country_name" type="xs:string"/>
                <xs:element name="population" type="xs:decimal"/>
            </xs:sequence>
        </xs:complexType>
    </xs:element>
    <xs:complexType name="City">
        <xs:sequence>
            <xs:element name="country_name" type="xs:string"/>
            <xs:element name="population" type="xs:decimal"/>
        </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
    <xs:element name="city" type="City"/>
<xs:element name="dHlwZXMvc29uZ3MueHNkL2NpdHk" type="City" originalname="city" requestedname="city" extraelement="true"/></xs:schema>
